hero.title: Transform operational chaos
hero.description: TenryuAG is the safety filter before any automation, software, or tech investment. We help SME owners regain control of their business before adding more technology to the system.

services.title: The right ladder to organize, modernize, and maintain
services.description: You can't automate what you don't understand. You can't scale what isn't organized.

map.title: Operational Harmony Map
map.description: The Diagnosis (Entry Point). Not a theoretical consultancy. It's a visual and structural mapping of your current operation (AS-IS).
features: Identification of what NOT to touch to avoid breaking operations
See your entire business in a single image

harmonyFlow.title: Harmony Flow System
harmonyFlow.description: The Implementation (Core Service). System and automation design that adapts to your real process, not the other way around.
features: Selective automation (only where it adds value)
Integration with tools you already use (Excel, legacy systems)

continuousHarmony.title: Continuous Harmony
continuousHarmony.description: The Maintenance. Continuous strategic accompaniment. TenryuAG acts as the Guardian Architect of Order for your business.
features: Prevent chaos from returning with growth

about.title: The origin of TenryuAG
about.description1: I come from the technical world. For years I worked as a backend developer, building systems, APIs, and automations. But I understood something key: Technology without order solves no problems. It only accelerates them.
about.description2: I saw companies with more software... and more chaos. More automation... and less control. The problem wasn't the lack of technology. It was the lack of operational clarity.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
philosophy.description: We are not an agency that implements and leaves. We are guardians of your system.

differentiator.title: Our differentiator
differentiator.description: We speak your language. We don't use tech-speak. We explain your business in a clear, human, and understandable way.
